description: A customizable feedback component used to provide additional context related to form input interactions. To use a custom icon, this component requires Modus icons to be installed in the host application. See [Modus Icon Usage](/docs/documentation-modus-icon-usage--docs) for steps.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the outer div element.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The Modus icon to use instead of the pre-defined icons.

properties.name: level
properties.description: The level informs which icon and color that will be rendered.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the feedback component.
